overview:
Manuel is currently Vice President at Zynga and leads its social gaming network (consumer platform) for web and mobile. Prior to this role Manuel was GM of FarmVille2 and held sr leadership Product and Game Design roles for Farmville and Zynga Poker

Before joining Zynga, Manuel was Director of Social Interactive Entertainment at Xbox LIVE, leading strategy, portfolio and business management for Video & Music, Applications, and New Interactive Entertainment Experiences for the Xbox LIVE service including Netflix, LastFM, Facebook, Twitter and ESPN

Prior to this role he launched “1 vs 100” and Xbox Live Primetime: The first ever programmatic, massively concurrent online game, service and platform on a videogame console. “1 vs 100” was the first of this breed of new games to feature a live host, real prizes and daily fresh content.

Manuel’s Microsoft career started as a product planner on Xbox 360 prior to the launch of the console. He later led the Xbox Incubation Team and served as a liaison between the Xbox organization and the startup and venture capital communities. Over his career at Microsoft, Bronstein has contributed to more than 5 patent submissions (one already granted)

Born in Caracas, Venezuela, Manuel received a bachelor of science in Electrical Engineering from Universidad Simon Bolivar in Caracas, Venezuela and an MBA from U.C. Berkeley Haas School of Business, where he worked on projects for AOL Music and Hewlett Packard in India. Prior experience include marketing and product management roles at Procter & Gamble, Tokenzone and one of Venezuela’s first Internet companies

He currently resides in Palo Alto with his wife and two sons.
